segments.text: What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God ! It ’ s my stomach . It ’ s killing me !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where does it hurt the most ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right here ! It hurts right here !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long has it felt like this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I felt OK when I woke up , and then , suddenly , I had this really sharp pain .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a history of stomach pain ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , and I haven ’ t done anything out of the ordinary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think that we are going to have to get you to an emergency room right away .
segments.speaker: S1
